name: Totally Pixelated Battle Simulator
description:
This was made for my 7th Game Jam Participation this time in the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. As an Engine we used Godot, which was the the first time I made a Game with Godot. All the Art and Sound Effect were done by me . The music is from our talented musician Timooff and the code was created by both Timooff  and myself combined.  The only restriction for the jam was to use the theme "Stronger Together".

Controls:

🖱️ Left Click
